name: Royal Dwarf
description: Royal Dwarf is a full-body hybrid bred by Royal Queen Seeds in Spain through crossing Skunk with a cannabis ruderalis variety. The result is a stout plant that autoflowers in a short 6 to 7 weeks with dark, crystal-sugared buds. Its effects quickly branch throughout the body, inducing head-to-toe relaxation thatâ€™s more physical than cerebral.
